attributes.action: introduce measures to enable better conservation of the landscape in both town in country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The beautiful landscape of Great Britain PLC has been one of its best assets. It has made GB a great place to live in, lovely to visit, and attractive for business.  It has provided a "natural health service" for people. Yet it is starting to look a mess. 

Changes should be made to the subsidies given to farmers so that the countryside is better looked after. Developers and public bodies should be required to conserve the landscape and townscape better; towns need a structure of well-treed corridors and green spaces. A new campaign is required to stop litter, fly-tipping, untidy land, eyesores, and roadside clutter. The National Curriculum should pay greater attention to environmental education. 

Measures like these could have wider benefits too, for example for biodiversity and climate change.
